menu.bottom.text: <font color='white'>滚动 </font><font color='gold' class='stratum-bold'>W/S</font><font color='white'> | 选择 </font><font color='gold' class='stratum-bold'>E</font><font color='white'> | 上一个 <font color='gold' class='stratum-bold'>CTRL</font><font color='white'> | 退出 </font><font color='gold' class='stratum-bold'>R</font>
